00063 ring_t usart0_receive_ring;
00064 #define USART0_RECEIVE_BUFFER_LEN   64
00065 uint8_t usart0_receive_buffer[USART0_RECEIVE_BUFFER_LEN];
00066 
00067 ring_t usart0_transmit_ring;
00068 #define USART0_TRANSMIT_BUFFER_LEN  128
00069 uint8_t usart0_transmit_buffer[USART0_TRANSMIT_BUFFER_LEN];

00072 //
00073 // Create some useful typdefs
00074 //
00075 
00076 typedef enum
00077 {
00078     usart_mode_asynchronous = 0,
00079     usart_mode_synchronous = 1
00080 } usart_mode_t;
00081 
00082 
00083 typedef enum
00084 {
00085     parity_none = 0,
00086         parity_even = 1,
00087     parity_odd = 2
00088 } usart_parity_t;
00089 
00090 typedef enum
00091 {
00092         baud_1200 = 1200,
00093         baud_2400 = 2400,
00094         baud_4800 = 4800,
00095         baud_9600 = 9600,
00096         baud_19200 = 19200,
00097         baud_38400 = 38400,
00098         baud_57600 = 57600 // 3/17/11 JWP
00099 } usart_baud_t;
00100 
00101 // JWP 3/21/11
00102 typedef enum
00103 {
00104     bit5 = 5,
00105     bit6 = 6,
00106     bit7 = 7,
00107         bit8 = 8,
00108         bit9 = 9
00109 } usart_databits_t;
00110 
00111 typedef enum
00112 {
00113         stopbit1 = 1,
00114         stopbit2 = 2
00115 } usart_stopbits_t;     
00116 
00117 typedef enum
00118 {
00119     flow_none = 0,
00120     flow_sw = 1,
00121     flow_hw = 2
00122 } usart_flow_control_t;
00123 
00124 typedef struct
00125 {
00126     usart_flow_control_t flow_control;
00127     uint8_t flow_out;
00128     uint8_t flow_in;
00129 } usart_flow_t;
00130 
00131 typedef struct
00132 {
00133     usart_baud_t baud;
00134     usart_parity_t parity;
00135     usart_flow_control_t flow_control;
00136 } usart_port_settings_t;

00456 #define usart_baudrate_to_setting(f_cpu, baud)          (uint16_t)(((uint32_t)(f_cpu) / ((uint32_t)(baud) * (uint32_t)16)) - 1)

00463 // Begin changes 3/17/11 JWP
00464 // Added Atmega328
00465 // TODO:
00466 // This code is tested in the most common uart mode: N,8,1 
00467 // Needs testing in other modes and with the hw and sw flow control
00468 // PLEASE - anyone who adapts this code for the untested modes show
00469 // us what you did so we can patch this.
00470 
00471 // 3/18/11 JWP added Atmega169
00472 #if defined(__AVR_ATmega169__)
00473    // ATMega with one uart that doesn't use 0 after register/bit names
00474    // like ATmega169
00475    #define UART_BAUD_RATE_HIGH                  UBRRH
00476    #define UART_BAUD_RATE_LOW                   UBRRL
00477    #define UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_A    UCSRA
00478    #define UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B    UCSRB
00479    #define UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_C    UCSRC
00480 
00481    #define UART_ENABLE_TRANSMITTER              TXEN
00482    #define UART_ENABLE_RECEIVER                 RXEN
00483    #define UART_READY_TO_TRANSMIT               UDRE
00484    #define UART_TRANSMIT_COMPLETE               TXC
00485    #define UART_RECEIVE_COMPLETE                RXC
00486    #define UART_DATA_REG                                UDR
00487    #define UART_STOP_BIT_SELECT                 USBS
00488    #define UART_CHARACTER_SIZE_0                UCSZ0
00489    #define UART_CHARACTER_SIZE_1                UCSZ1
00490    #define UART_CHARACTER_SIZE_2                UCSZ2
00491    #define UART_MODE_SELECT                             UMSEL
00492    #define UART_DOUBLE_SPEED                    U2X
00493    #define UART_FRAME_ERROR                             FE
00494    #define UART_DATA_OVER_RUN                   DOR
00495    #define UART_PARITY_ERROR                    UPE
00496    #define UART_PARITY_MODE_0                   UPM0
00497    #define UART_PARITY_MODE_1                   UPM1
00498    #define UART_MULTI_PROCESSOR_COMMUNICATION_MODE      MPCM
00499    #define UART_TX_COMPLETE_INTERRUPT_ENABLE    TXCIE
00500    #define UART_RX_COMPLETE_INTERRUPT_ENABLE    RXCIE
00501    #define UART_DATA_REGISTER_EMPTY_INTERRUPT_ENABLE    UDRIE
00502    #define UART_RX_DATA_BIT_8   RXB8
00503    #define UART_TX_DATA_BIT_8   TXB8
00504 
00505 #elif defined(__AVR_ATmega128__) \
00506 || defined(__AVR_ATmega1281__) \
00507 || defined(__AVR_ATmega2561__) \
00508 || defined(__AVR_ATmega328P__)
00509 
00510    // ATMega with two uarts - uart 0
00511    // or with one uart but using 0 in register/bit names (like ATmega328)
00512    #define UART_BAUD_RATE_HIGH                  UBRR0H
00513    #define UART_BAUD_RATE_LOW                   UBRR0L
00514    #define UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_A    UCSR0A
00515    #define UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B    UCSR0B
00516    #define UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_C    UCSR0C
00517 
00518    #define UART_ENABLE_TRANSMITTER              TXEN0
00519    #define UART_ENABLE_RECEIVER                 RXEN0
00520    #define UART_READY_TO_TRANSMIT               UDRE0
00521    #define UART_TRANSMIT_COMPLETE               TXC0
00522    #define UART_RECEIVE_COMPLETE                RXC0
00523    #define UART_DATA_REG                                UDR0
00524    #define UART_STOP_BIT_SELECT                 USBS0
00525    #define UART_CHARACTER_SIZE_0                UCSZ00
00526    #define UART_CHARACTER_SIZE_1                UCSZ01
00527    #define UART_CHARACTER_SIZE_2                UCSZ02
00528    #define UART_MODE_SELECT                             UMSEL // ATmega128 
00529    #define UART_MODE_SELECT_0                   UMSEL00
00530    #define UART_MODE_SELECT_1                   UMSEL01
00531    #define UART_DOUBLE_SPEED                    U2X0
00532    #define UART_FRAME_ERROR                             FE0
00533    #define UART_DATA_OVER_RUN                   DOR0
00534    #define UART_PARITY_ERROR                    UPE0
00535    #define UART_PARITY_MODE_0                   UPM00
00536    #define UART_PARITY_MODE_1                   UPM01
00537    #define UART_MULTI_PROCESSOR_COMMUNICATION_MODE      MPCM0
00538    #define UART_TX_COMPLETE_INTERRUPT_ENABLE    TXCIE0
00539    #define UART_RX_COMPLETE_INTERRUPT_ENABLE    RXCIE0
00540    #define UART_DATA_REGISTER_EMPTY_INTERRUPT_ENABLE    UDRIE0
00541    #define UART_RX_DATA_BIT_8   RXB80
00542    #define UART_TX_DATA_BIT_8   TXB08
00543 #else
00544    #error "no uart definition for MCU"
00545 #endif
00546 
00547 // GCC compiler specific.
00548 #if defined(__AVR_ATmega128__) \
00549 || defined(__AVR_ATmega1281__) \
00550 || defined(__AVR_ATmega2561__) \
00551 || defined(__AVR_ATmega169__)
00552         #define usart0_receive_interrupt_service_routine        ISR(USART0_RX_vect)
00553         #define usart0_transmit_interrupt_service_routine       ISR(USART0_UDRE_vect)
00554 #elif defined(__AVR_ATmega328P__)
00555         #define usart0_receive_interrupt_service_routine        ISR(USART_RX_vect)
00556         #define usart0_transmit_interrupt_service_routine       ISR(USART_UDRE_vect)
00557 #else
00558    #error "no interrupt definition for MCU"
00559 #endif
00560 
00561 
00562 #define usart0_mode(x)      (UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_C = (UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_C & (uint8_t)~((1<<UART_MODE_SELECT_0)|(1<<UART_MODE_SELECT_1))) | (uint8_t)((x) << UART_MODE_SELECT_0))
00563 
00564 #define usart0_clock_polarity(x)    bit_write(x, UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_C, BIT(UCPOL0))
00565 
00566 #define usart0_transmit_enable()    (UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B |= (uint8_t)(1 << UART_ENABLE_TRANSMITTER))
00567 #define usart0_transmit_disable()   (UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B &= (uint8_t)~(1 << UART_ENABLE_TRANSMITTER))
00568 
00569 #define usart0_receive_enable()     (UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B |= (uint8_t)(1 << UART_ENABLE_RECEIVER))
00570 #define usart0_receive_disable()    (UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B &= (uint8_t)~(1 << UART_ENABLE_RECEIVER))
00571 
00572 #define usart0_transmit_speed_double_enable()   (UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_A |= (uint8_t)(1 << UART_DOUBLE_SPEED))
00573 #define usart0_transmit_speed_double_disable()  (UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_A &= (uint8_t)~(1 << UART_DOUBLE_SPEED))
00574 
00575 #define usart0_receive_complete()           bit_read(UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_A, BIT(UART_RECEIVE_COMPLETE))
00576 
00577 #define usart0_transmit_complete()          bit_read(UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_A, BIT(UART_TRANSMIT_COMPLETE))
00578 
00579 #define usart0_data_register_empty()        bit_read(UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_A, BIT(UART_READY_TO_TRANSMIT))
00580 
00581 #define usart0_frame_error()                bit_read(UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_A, BIT(UART_FRAME_ERROR))
00582 
00583 #define usart0_data_overrun()               bit_read(UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_A, BIT(UART_DATA_OVER_RUN))
00584 
00585 #define usart0_parity_error()               bit_read(UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_A, BIT(UART_PARITY_ERROR))
00586 
00587 #define usart0_multiprocessor_mode(x)       bit_write(x, UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_A, BIT(UART_MULTI-PROCESSOR_COMMUNICATION_MODE))
00588 
00589 #define usart0_receive_complete_interrupt_enable()      (UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B |= (uint8_t)(1 << UART_RX_COMPLETE_INTERRUPT_ENABLE))
00590 #define usart0_receive_complete_interrupt_disable()     (UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B &= (uint8_t)~(1 << UART_RX_COMPLETE_INTERRUPT_ENABLE))
00591 
00592 #define usart0_receive_complete_interrupt_get()         (UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B & (1 << UART_RX_COMPLETE_INTERRUPT_ENABLE))
00593 
00594 #define usart0_transmit_complete_interrupt_enable()     UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B |= (uint8_t)(1 << UART_TX_COMPLETE_INTERRUPT_ENABLE)
00595 #define usart0_transmit_complete_interrupt_disable()    UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B &= (uint8_t)~(1 << UART_TX_COMPLETE_INTERRUPT_ENABLE)
00596 
00597 #define usart0_transmit_complete_interrupt_get()        (UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B & (1 << TXCIE0))
00598 
00599 #define usart0_data_register_empty_interrupt_enable()   (UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B |= (uint8_t)(1 << UART_DATA_REGISTER_EMPTY_INTERRUPT_ENABLE))
00600 #define usart0_data_register_empty_interrupt_disable()  (UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B &= (uint8_t)~(1 << UART_DATA_REGISTER_EMPTY_INTERRUPT_ENABLE))
00601 
00602 #define usart0_data_register_empty_interrupt_get()      bit_read(UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B, BIT(UART_DATA_REGISTER_EMPTY_INTERRUPT_ENABLE))
00603 
00604 #define usart0_receive_data_bit_8(x)                    bit_write(x, UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B, BIT(UART_RX_DATA_BIT_8))
00605 
00606 #define usart0_transmit_data_bit_8(x)                   bit_write(x, UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B, BIT(UART_tX_DATA_BIT_8))
00607 
00608 #define usart0_stop_bits_set(stop_bits) \
00609 do{                                     \
00610     if((stop_bits) >= 1 && (stop_bits) <= 2)    \
00611     {                                           \
00612         bit_write((stop_bits) - 1, UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_C, BIT(UART_STOP_BIT_SELECT)); \
00613     }                                           \
00614 }while(0)
00615 
00616 
00617 #define usart0_data_bits_set(data_bits) \
00618 do{         \
00619     if((data_bits) >= 5 && (data_bits) <= 8)    \
00620     {       \
00621         bit_write(bit_read(((data_bits) - 5), BIT(0)), UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_C, BIT(UART_CHARACTER_SIZE_0)); \
00622         bit_write(bit_read(((data_bits) - 5), BIT(1)), UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_C, BIT(UART_CHARACTER_SIZE_1)); \
00623         bit_clear(UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B, BIT(UART_CHARACTER_SIZE_2));     \
00624     }       \
00625     if((data_bits) == 9)    \
00626     {       \
00627         bit_set(UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_C, BIT(UART_CHARACTER_SIZE_0));    \
00628         bit_set(UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_C, BIT(UART_CHARACTER_SIZE_1));    \
00629         bit_set(UART_CONTROL_STATUS_REG_B, BIT(UART_CHARACTER_SIZE_2));    \
00630     }       \
00631 }while(0)
00632 
00633 #define usart0_rts_enable()     bit_clear(USART0_RTS_PORT, USART0_RTS)
00634 
00635 #define usart0_rts_disable()    bit_set(USART0_RTS_PORT, USART0_RTS)
00636 
00637 #define usart0_rts_init()   \
00638 do{     \
00639     usart0_rts_enable();    \
00640     bit_set(USART0_RTS_PORT_DIRECTION, USART0_RTS); \
00641 }while(0)
00642 
00643 #define usart0_cts_read()       bit_read(USART0_CTS_PORT, USART0_CTS)
00644 
00645 #define usart0_cts_init()   \
00646 do{     \
00647     bit_clear(USART0_CTS_PORT_DIRECTION, USART0_CTS); \
00648 }while(0)
